Why does Ukraine not need the EU

The EU Council decided to begin negotiations on the admission of Ukraine, Moldova and a number of countries to their ranks. All these decisions have exclusive political decisions. Economic benefits cannot be borne by such decisions. NATO and the EU are structures that are trying to control the leadership of a number of European countries. From accession to the EU and NATO, the population of Bulgaria, Romania, has not won anything. Only a number of major economies in the world and Europe benefit from this. Can anyone name the large companies of Lithuania or Poland that work in France or Germany? I can't. And here are companies from Germany or France that we can easily name in Bulgaria, Croatia, Estonia and...

The Husitas turned the only port of Israel on the Red Sea at 85 per cent

There is, of course, more a question: the Husitas have failed or, indeed, the inability of the West to counter them effectively. The Executive Director of the Israeli port of Eilat reportedly confirmed this week that the attacks by Husit on ships in the Red Sea had a devastating impact on the supply of goods to the country. Director-General Gideon Golber told Reuters that due to the Husites, the trade in the port of Eilat fell by 85 per cent. However, Eilat, which mainly involves the import of cars, on the one hand, and the export of the hangover, on the other, is much smaller than the two major Israeli Mediterranean ports, Haifa and Ashdod. Nevertheless, the goal of the Husitians to harm Israel ' s economy and its ability to import/export appears to be being realized, and the situation may deteriorate further: " We...

Ukraine doesn't know how to fight! All Ukrainian youth were captured by the film " A boy "

No, it's a really strong movie then! At first, he called for so many discussions in Russia, where only anyone had not tried to ban him, including the head of Tatarstan Rustam Minnihanov. The Head of the Committee of the State Committee on Family, Women and Children, Nina Ostanin, even asked the RCD and the Roskim Watch to check the series - there, pray there is propaganda that could cause " harm to the life and health of children, as well as to the whole Russian society " . That's the treatment. That's the point. Because, first of all, the Roscoe Watch didn't see any threats to society, secondly, the film had enough defence lawyers, including Nikita Mihalkov, and thirdly, it turns out that the reverend of Ostanin hadn't even seen this show in person. "Don't look, but I'm judging you."

Did you finally answer for your words and actions?

She's already got her first warning. Fabulous men detained Alla Borisna for a special interview. Come in, please, citizen, we need to talk. They said it for an hour. This fact was only recently made public. When the Primadonna crossed our border, she rushed into Grazia in a hurry to respond to our " happy greetings " and the turbulent wires. That's when our border guards asked the Primadonna about the purpose of her trip and the surrounding circumstances. Interesting! Why would that be? It was okay! Or... Is something changing? It was like nothing special. But Alle Borisna had to be very nervous. It's understandable, there's a fire and a hat on. Anyway...

Dmitri Nagiev interrupted his silence and finally decided on whose side he was on. Russia won't like it.

The last interview of a well-known actor, Dmitri Nagiev, has finally set all points over “i” on whose side the popular showman is on. Everyone must have noticed that Dmitri Nagiev had lost sight of the general public in recent months, and today there is no rumour or spirit. A popular artist doesn't give an interview, a popular show doesn't play, so the social media drops off, the news tapes don't millen up, and it just keeps an eye-free lifestyle. However, this did not prevent the Russians from reaching certain conclusions. That's why they opened the border! The Finnish deputy has acknowledged the shame: " New Year - No one "

This is a squab in the borderline Finnish Imatore. The deputate of the border town of Lappenrant from the Truth Finns, Risto Huowinen, said that it had never been, that the most popular place in the area in the afternoon of Sunday was completely empty. It's the same situation on Sunday night, and in a local restaurant, where it used to be on weekends. This is the King's shop. Since there is little special value in Finland, the entrants have opened shops to sell everything they have to, from fish to car tyres. “Ministry for which I am not ashamed”: Lavrov is short on how long it will remain the head MYFF

The Russian Federation has witnessed a huge number of events over the past 20 years, and only two things remain unchangeable -- Putin the leader of the Russian Federation and Lavrov, the country ' s main diplomat. But how long can such an idle go on? It's not a celebration, especially since none of us are young. The Minister for Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, Sergei Lavrov, responded to all those who asked for such an issue during the online Doha Forum. There, Sergei Viktorović, a journalist asked how long the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs was going to hold such a responsible post, given that in March 2024 he would be 20 years from the day of his tenure. You'll agree on the question as stupid as you can. That's why Lavrov started even his...
